The next day, I woke up earlier than usual and\nnervously paced around my room.%K%P
'I wonder if this is okay.'%K%P
I checked how I looked for the umpteenth time\nand checked the time on my phone. It was still a\nlittle early.%K%P
'I can't make her wait for me.'%K%P
I checked my clothes one last time, then left\nthe apartments.%K%P
'Our first date... I'm so nervous.'%K%P
We'd gone places together before, but never as a\ncouple.%K%P
I hoped Akane would enjoy herself.%K%P
'Sorry to keep you waiting!'%K%P
Akane came flying out of nowhere, taking me by\nsurprise.%K%P
'No, you're right on time.'%K%P
The old Akane probably would have been late.%K%P
It was a little thing, but it really showed how\nmuch she had progressed.%K%P
'Oh, I saw you waiting and thought I was late\nagain.'%K%P
'You didn't need to rush. I wouldn't have been\nmad if you were late.'%K%P
'Yeah, but it would bother me. I'd feel bad if I\nmade you wait.'%K%P
'Well, I see what you're saying, but...'%K%P
I remembered that it was our first date, and\ntook a good look at Akane.%K%P
She was wearing her regular clothes, but for\nsome reason she looked a hundred times cuter.%K%P
'Wh-What? Is my hair messed up? Is something\nwrong?'%K%P
'No, not at all. Just the opposite. You look\neven cuter than you usually do.'%K%P
'Huh?! But this is what I always wear!'%K%P
'No, really, you look wonderful.'%K%P
'Heehee, awww. Thanks for saying so.'%K%P
'And...you look even better than usual, too.'%K%P
Akane said to me shyly, her face red. I felt so\nembarrassed I looked away.%K%P
'Oh, you're hiding your face!'%K%P
'W-Well, you know. It's hard not to get\nembarrassed when you tell me I look good right\nto my face. Sorry, I didn't mean anything.'%K%P
'I just said it because it's true. Anyway,\nhere.'%K%P
She held out her hand.%K%P
So that was what she wanted.%K%P
'Like this?'%K%P
I twined my fingers in hers and held her hand.%K%P
'Heehee, yah!'%K%P
'Wha?!'%K%P
Grasping my hand, Akane gave me a jerk and\nsuddenly we were arm in arm.%K%P
'Like this!'%K%P
It was so sudden.%K%P
But, now I could enjoy the feel of her even\nmore, and despite the embarrassment it was\nfantastic.%K%P
'S-So then... Off we go!'%K%P
'Yeah!' It tastes good, but best of all is Arm\nin arm, Akane and I made our way to the shopping\nstreet.%K%P
When we got there, people on the street saw us\nwith our arms linked%K%P
Because of that, they yelled out at us. It\nreally ruined the mood.%K%P
To them, Akane only said...%K%P
'Sho's finally fallen for my irresistible\ncharms!'%K%P
I just listened with a wry smile as Akane yelled\nout gleefully at my side.%K%P
The people passing by finally settled down, and\nwe got a break.%K%P
'Ugh, the people around here are real gossips.\nHuh? Are you okay, Akane?'%K%P
Akane was frowning unhappily.%K%P
'Never mind. I just feel like an idiot being the\nonly one to say anything.'%K%P
'Sorry. I didn't mean to leave you hanging, I\nwas just kind of embarrassed.'%K%P
'We're a couple now, I just thought you'd back\nme up, or show me you cared.'%K%P
'I'm really sorry.'%K%P
'Do you feel bad about it?'%K%P
'Of course I do.'%K%P
'Okay then. Kiss me and I'll forgive you.'%K%P
Akane closed her eyes and puckered her small,\npink mouth, bringing her face close to mine.%K%P
B-But a kiss, right there in front of everyone?!%K%P
'Um... I can't right here, but is this good\nenough?'%K%P
Instead of a kiss, I gave her a gentle pet on\nthe head, and Akane broke out in a smile.%K%P
'Mm... Eheh... Okay, yes, fine, I forgive you.'%K%P
Looked like I got off easy.%K%P
'But you really are amazing.'%K%P
'Why, all of a sudden?'%K%P
'All those people calling out to you like that,\nbeing so nice. It's so rare.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Yeah. They all must like you so much.'%K%P
'I thought it was normal. It's not?'%K%P
'Well, people don't check up on those they don't\nlike.'%K%P
'Huh... I never noticed before, but I guess lots\nof people have been really nice to me.'%K%P
This realization seemed to make her happy, and\nher face beamed.%K%P
Seeing her like that made me happy, too.%K%P
'So is there anywhere in particular you'd like\nto check out?'%K%P
'Not really, no. Just walking next to you like\nthis is plenty fun.'%K%P
'Okay then, can I recommend a cafe?'%K%P
'Go ahead!'%K%P
It looked like Akane was interested.%K%P
'A cafe, huh? Sounds nice! This will be my first\ntime!'%K%P
'That place has the best desserts, parfaits and\nstuff. I think you'll like it.'%K%P
'Parfaits! Oh, yeah! Come on, let's hurry!'%K%P
'H-Hey! Stop pulling! Jeez.'%K%P
I couldn't help speeding up as Akane pulled me\nalong.%K%P
'So this is your recommendation...'%K%P
The staff showed us to our seats, and Akane took\nin the shop interior.%K%P
'It's got nice ambiance!'%K%P
'They really take care with their decorating.'%K%P
One thing I like about this shop is how they use\nscreens and bamboo table settings to create an\nold Japanese feeling.%K%P
'The menu's got sweet bean soup, syrup\ndumplings, sweet buns, green tea parfaits... Oh\nwow.'%K%P
Akane scanned the menu intently.%K%P
As I looked at her, she raised her eyes and our\ngazes met.%K%P
'Do you know what you're getting?'%K%P
'I'm getting the sweet bean soup with\ndumplings.'%K%P
'Oh, that sounds good!'%K%P
'How about you?'%K%P
'Oh, I want to eat it all, I just can't decide.\nHm... What do you recommend?'%K%P
'I think I'd recommend the green tea waffles.\nThey come with ice cream and chestnuts, so\ngood.'%K%P
'Waffles, huh... Anything else?'%K%P
'The parfait, I guess. It's kind of expensive,\nbut it's really big so it'll fill you up.'%K%P
'I see... Oh!'%K%P
Akane froze in the middle of flipping through\nthe menu.%K%P
Clearly, she found something she liked.%K%P
'Did you decide?'%K%P
'Yeah! I found the perfect thing for the moment.\nExcuse me! Yes, I'll have this!'%K%P
As soon as she decided, Akane ordered for\nherself, ignoring me.%K%P
'Whoa, hey, what about me?'%K%P
'Don't worry about it, trust me!'%K%P
She had a huge grin on her face.%K%P
I suddenly had a bad feeling.%K%P
'Ah. Now I see...'%K%P
Our order came after a few minutes.%K%P
Sitting before me was the 'Pudding and\nStrawberry Lovey-Dovey Merry-Go-Round Parfait\nFor Lovers Only.'%K%P
It was about twice as big as a regular parfait,\nwas decorated with heart-shaped chocolates, and\ncame with two spoons.%K%P
'I decided as soon as I saw it. It looks so\nyummy, and best of all, we can eat it together!'%K%P
'Yeah, with this much, I certainly didn't need\nto order anything else.'%K%P
And if I even tried to eat anything more, I was\nsure I'd get heartburn from all the sugar.%K%P
'Right? Come on, let's eat! Say aaah!'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
I froze, staring at the spoon Akane was holding\nout.%K%P
'What's wrong?'%K%P
'Oh, just... I can feed myself, you know.'%K%P
'No no no, this is a couple's parfait, we've got\nto feed each other!'%K%P
'And remember, you fed me when I was feeling\nsick!'%K%P
'Th-That was different, it didn't mean--'%K%P
'Enough arguing! Take that!'%K%P
'Mph!'%K%P
Akane stuffed the spoon in my mouth and I\nswallowed by reflex. The sweet cream and mild\nsourness of strawberries filled my mouth.%K%P
'It's good...'%K%P
'Heheh... Now it's your turn!'%K%P
'...Do I have to?'%K%P
'Of course! Come on, aaah!'%K%P
Akane closed her eyes and opened her delicate\nmouth.%K%P
Oh well. I resigned myself.%K%P
'Aaahhh...'%K%P
I scooped up some parfait and put it in her cute\nlittle mouth.%K%P
'Mmm! It's good! So good!'%K%P
'It tastes good, but best of all, you fed it to\nme.  It made it even tastier!'%K%P
Man, oh man.%K%P
How could she be so adorable?%K%P
'Okay, now it's my turn. Say aaah!'%K%P
She scooped some more and held the spoon out.%K%P
Yeah, it was clear I couldn't get out of it.%K%P
I gave up and opened my mouth.%K%P
'Aaah... Mmmm. It's not as sweet as I thought\nit'd be, but it's really easy to eat.'%K%P
'Right? You can just keep eating forever! So,\nhere, aaaah!'%K%P
'We're going to keep doing this?'%K%P
'Of course! Hurry up!'%K%P
While she urged me on, I continued feeding her,\nfeeling a kind of desperation.%K%P
At first I had been embarrassed, but that\nfeeling dulled as time went on and now I was\nfeeding her steadily.%K%P
'Say a-- Oh! Rats.'%K%P
The ice cream she'd scooped up was melting and\nsome dripped from her spoon onto her chest.%K%P
'Are you okay?'%K%P
'Yes, it didn't get on my clothes. But what a\nwaste... Oh! Sho, why don't you lick it off?'%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
'Just for you! Go ahead, lick away!'%K%P
Akane lifter her breast alluringly, showing me\nwhere to lick.%K%P
Staring at the cream resting on her trembling\nskin, I felt temptation breaking through my\nreason.%K%P
'Come on, what's the matter?'%K%P
Her teasing tone of voice planted a seed of\nresistance.%K%P
I knew she'd just keep going like that, so...%K%P
'Okay then, let me just get closer...'%K%P
'What's wrong? You said I should lick it off!'%K%P
'Th-That was just a little joke! I was just\nteasing. we're out here in front of everybody,\nso we should save that for home!'%K%P
Once I'd begun my counterattack, Akane's face\nhad gone beet red.%K%P
'Now hold still so I can lick you.'%K%P
'S-Stop! No! Forget what I said! Forget it!'%K%P
As I started to lean over the table, Akane\ngrabbed a napkin and quickly wiped the ice cream\naway.%K%P
'Oh, I never expected you to come back at my\nteasing like that!'%K%P
Akane muttered, red faced, looking like she\nwanted to disappear in her chair.%K%P
'Now you know not to tease me like that.'%K%P
'But...you're blushing, too.'%K%P
'Quiet, you!'%K%P
I had to admit, though, my heart was pounding\nand my face felt hot. I wasn't used to this.%K%P
'L-Let's hurry up and finish this.'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
We ate the rest of our parfait, both fiercely\nblushing.%K%P
The time flew by, we were having so much fun.%K%P
After we left the cafe, we wandered through the\nshopping street and stopped at the park. It was\nevening before we knew it.%K%P
We walked back to Tsubaki, still arm-in- arm,\nbut somehow more comfortable than before.%K%P
'Today was so much fun! Let's go again soon.'%K%P
'We can go as many times as you want.'%K%P
'Great, let's go to that cafe again! Next time,\nI'll get the waffles you recommended.'%K%P
We walked and talked about the day, and as Akane\nlooked over Kannagi, she said...%K%P
'Today, so many people asked about me...'%K%P
'I never thought about what it meant before\ntoday...'%K%P
'I mean, I was always talking to people, not\neven thinking about it, so I thought that was\nnormal.'%K%P
'But today I got it, when all those people were\nso nice to me.'%K%P
'What did you get?'%K%P
'They're all just good people, who actually care\nabout me.'%K%P
'But I caused all kinds of trouble for them,\nwith my temper and my selfishness.'%K%P
'Maybe. The old Akane might have been like\nthat.'%K%P
I agreed quietly.%K%P
Right now, Akane was realizing something about\nherself, she didn't need my clumsy support.%K%P
'I'm an Aragami, but I want to use my Jinriki to\nhelp people.'%K%P
'There are people who care for me, so I want to\ncare for them.'%K%P
'You can do that. I know you can. You've already\nstarted by noticing them.'%K%P
Akane gripped my arm tightly.%K%P
'Thank you. It's all because of you.'%K%P
'I just lent a hand. This is just more proof of\nyou growing up.'%K%P
'But you're the one who's been the nicest to\nme.'%K%P
'Of course! I'm your boyfriend, aren't I?'%K%P
As we approached Tsubaki Apartments, arms\nentwined, our footsteps slowed of their own\naccord.%K%P
'We're back!'%K%P
'Welcome home!'%K%P
'Welcome home, the both of you.'%K%P
They greeted us as we came into the living room,\nstill arm-in-arm.%K%P
'It looks like you two had fun on your date!'%K%P
'Of course! I never dreamed it would be so much\nfun!'%K%P
'Sho did a proper job of showing you around,\nhuh? Where'd you go?'%K%P
'Well...'%K%P
Akane excitedly told Maika about our date.%K%P
'Pardon me, Sho?'%K%P
While I was watching the two of them talking and\nlaughing, Inori called out to me, a strange look\non her face.%K%P
'What's wrong?'%K%P
'There's something I need to discuss with you\ntwo. If I come to your room later, will you two\nwait for me there?'%K%P
'Yes, of course.'%K%P
'Thank you very much. Well then, I'll retire for\nnow.'%K%P
Bowing lightly, she left the living room.%K%P
I wondered what she could have to discuss with\nus.%K%P
I sat alone, head bowed, pondering what it could\nbe.%K%P
